divs: sighting detailsi was driving down lexington\lake drive to go to my buddies trailer home and suddenly a very random large vibrant display of fireworks began to erupt suddenly a couple streets down. as i was paying attention to the fireworks, a couple of lights caught my eye in the sky, they were a very exuberant red and blue glowing alternating lights, not flashing like an airplane or helicopter would. this ''ufo'' was in the sky for at least a couple minutes slowly gliding on by apass my head. suddenly within a minute or so after the accurance, a helicopter with a spotlight went chasing after it in the same direction the craft was going. i know what i saw was not an everyday flying craft. it slowly hovered across the sky at about the height maybe a news helicopter would report a police chase. this ''ufo'' was so close to the ground that i even had the chance to snap a photo of the vibrant lights on my phone. it most certainly was a floating disk that went across the sky. and i am now a believer. this accurance happened 8-3-10 9:30pm it is extremely hard to see on my phone but when the photo is zoomed up like 300% you can actually see the circle body form of the craft around the lights!
Summary: 2 very vibrant lights, 1 red 1 blue, and 1 white light.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Circle Pines
There were no other sightings in Circle Pines on or around August 3rd 2010
